question: A 39-year-old woman with poorly controlled systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) presents to her rheumatologist for a follow-up visit. She has had intermittent myalgias, arthralgias, fatigue, and skin rashes over the past 10 years that have acutely worsened over the past year. She works as a school teacher but reports that she has had to miss several days of work due to her symptoms. She has been on hydroxychloroquine for several years but does not feel that it is adequately controlling her symptoms. She does not smoke or drink alcohol. Her temperature is 99.2°F (37.3°C), blood pressure is 130/75 mmHg, pulse is 80/min, and respirations are 18/min. On exam, she is well-appearing and in no acute distress. She has erythematous, raised plaques with keratotic scaling and follicular plugging on her hands. The physician decides to trial the patient on low-dose prednisone to better control her symptoms. At 2 months of follow-up, she reports that her flares have subsided and she has been able to return to work full-time. If this patient continues this medication regimen, she will be at an elevated risk for developing which of the following?
question_persian: زنی ۳۹ ساله با لوپوس اریتماتوس سیستمیک (SLE) که به خوبی کنترل نشده است، برای ویزیت پیگیری به روماتولوژیست خود مراجعه می‌کند. او در ۱۰ سال گذشته دچار میالژی‌های متناوب، آرترالژی‌ها، خستگی و بثورات پوستی شده است که در سال گذشته به طور حاد تشدید شده‌اند. او به عنوان معلم مدرسه کار می‌کند اما گزارش می‌دهد که به دلیل علائم خود مجبور شده است چند روز از کار خود را از دست بدهد. او چندین سال است که هیدروکسی کلروکین مصرف می‌کند اما احساس می‌کند که این دارو به اندازه کافی علائم او را کنترل نمی‌کند. او سیگار نمی‌کشد و الکل مصرف نمی‌کند. دمای بدن او 99.2°F (37.3°C)، فشار خون ۱۳۰/۷۵ mmHg، نبض ۸۰ در دقیقه و تنفس ۱۸ در دقیقه است. در معاینه، او به خوبی ظاهر شده و در وضعیت حاد نیست. او پلاک‌های اریتماتوز برجسته با پوسته‌ریزی کراتوتیک و انسداد فولیکولی در دستان خود دارد. پزشک تصمیم می‌گیرد که بیمار را با پردنیزون با دوز پایین تحت درمان قرار دهد تا بهتر علائم او را کنترل کند. در پیگیری دو ماهه، او گزارش می‌دهد که تشدید علائم فروکش کرده و توانسته است به کار تمام وقت برگردد. اگر این بیمار به این رژیم دارویی ادامه دهد، در معرض خطر بالاتر برای توسعه کدام یک از موارد زیر خواهد بود؟
new_question_stem: A 39-year-old woman with poorly controlled systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) presents to her rheumatologist for a follow-up visit. She has had intermittent myalgias, arthralgias, fatigue, and skin rashes over the past 10 years that have acutely worsened over the past year. She works as a school teacher but reports that she has had to miss several days of work due to her symptoms. She has been on hydroxychloroquine for several years but does not feel that it is adequately controlling her symptoms. She does not smoke or drink alcohol. Her temperature is 99.2°F (37.3°C), blood pressure is 130/75 mmHg, pulse is 80/min, and respirations are 18/min. On exam, she is well-appearing and in no acute distress. She has erythematous, raised plaques with keratotic scaling and follicular plugging on her hands. The physician decides to trial the patient on low-dose prednisone to better control her symptoms. At 2 months of follow-up, she reports that her flares have subsided and she has been able to return to work full-time. If this patient continues this medication regimen, she will be at an elevated risk for developing which of the following?
additional_correct_answer: hypertension; dyslipidemia; fluid retention; electrolyte disturbances (decreased serum potassium, sodium retention); arrhythmias (from rare cases of bradycardia to more common reports of atrial fibrillation)

question: An 18-year-old woman makes an appointment with a gynecologist for her first gynecologic examination. She did not disclose her past medical history, but her sexual debut occurred with her boyfriend 3 weeks ago. She is now complaining of a yellow-green, diffuse, malodorous vaginal discharge that she noticed 1 week ago for the first time. She also reported mild pelvic and abdominal pain. cervical motion tenderness was noted during the pelvic examination. The gynecologist also noticed a pink and inflamed nulliparous cervix with a preponderance of small red punctate spots. There was a frothy white discharge with a malodorous odor in the vaginal vault. A wet mount was prepared for a light microscopic examination, which revealed numerous squamous cells and motile organisms. The gynecologist concluded that this was a sexually-transmitted infection. What is the causative organism?
question_persian: یک زن ۱۸ ساله برای اولین معاینه زنان به یک متخصص زنان مراجعه می‌کند. او سابقه پزشکی گذشته خود را فاش نکرده است، اما اولین تجربه جنسی او با دوست پسرش ۳ هفته پیش بوده است. او اکنون از ترشحات واژینال زرد-سبز، پراکنده و بدبو که برای اولین بار یک هفته پیش متوجه آن شده است، شکایت دارد. او همچنین از درد خفیف لگن و شکم گزارش داده است. حساسیت به حرکت گردن رحم در طی معاینه لگنی مشاهده شد. متخصص زنان همچنین متوجه گردن رحم صورتی و ملتهب بدون زایمان با تعداد زیادی لکه‌های کوچک قرمز شد. ترشح سفید و کف آلود با بوی بد در واژن مشاهده شد. یک مرطوب آماده شد برای معاینه میکروسکوپی نوری که سلول‌های پوششی متعدد و ارگانیسم‌های متحرک را نشان داد. متخصص زنان نتیجه گرفت که این یک عفونت منتقله از راه جنسی است. عامل عفونت چیست؟
new_question_stem: An 18-year-old woman makes an appointment with a gynecologist for her first gynecologic examination. She did not disclose her past medical history, but her sexual debut occurred with her boyfriend 3 weeks ago. She is now complaining of a yellow-green, diffuse, malodorous vaginal discharge that she noticed 1 week ago for the first time. She also reported mild pelvic and abdominal pain. cervical motion tenderness was noted during the pelvic examination. The gynecologist also noticed a pink and inflamed nulliparous cervix with a preponderance of small red punctate spots. There was a frothy white discharge with a malodorous odor in the vaginal vault. A wet mount was prepared for a light microscopic examination, which revealed numerous squamous cells and motile organisms. The gynecologist concluded that this was a sexually-transmitted infection. What is the causative organism?

question: A 31-year-old man comes to the emergency department because of acute onset neck pain and enlargement. Specifically, he reports that he has been experiencing pain and swelling of the anterior portion of his neck near the midline. Otherwise, he says that he has been getting tired easily and feels cold often. Physical exam reveals a painful diffusely enlarged thyroid gland with many small nodules. A biopsy is obtained showing diffuse cellular hyperplasia with areas of focal colloid hyperplasia. Given these findings, the patient is started on appropriate therapy, and the neck mass becomes smaller over time. Which of the following is most likely associated with the cause of this patient's symptoms?
question_persian: مردی ۳۱ ساله به بخش اورژانس مراجعه کرده به دلیل شروع حاد درد و بزرگ شدن گردن. به طور خاص، او گزارش می‌دهد که درد و تورم در قسمت جلویی گردن نزدیک به خط میانی دارد. به غیر از این، او می‌گوید که به راحتی خسته می‌شود و اغلب احساس سرما می‌کند. معاینه فیزیکی غده تیروئید بزرگ شده و دردناک با تعداد زیادی ندول کوچک را نشان می‌دهد. بیوپسی گرفته شده نشان‌دهنده هیپرپلازی سلولی منتشر با نواحی هیپرپلازی کولویید موضعی است. با توجه به این یافته‌ها، بیمار تحت درمان مناسب قرار می‌گیرد و توده گردنی به مرور زمان کوچک‌تر می‌شود. کدام‌یک از موارد زیر به احتمال زیاد با علت علائم این بیمار مرتبط است؟
new_question_stem: A 31-year-old man comes to the emergency department because of acute onset neck pain and enlargement. Specifically, he reports that he has been experiencing pain and swelling of the anterior portion of his neck near the midline. Otherwise, he says that he has been getting tired easily and feels cold often. Physical exam reveals a painful diffusely enlarged thyroid gland with many small nodules. A biopsy is obtained showing diffuse cellular hyperplasia with areas of focal colloid hyperplasia. Given these findings, the patient is started on appropriate therapy, and the neck mass becomes smaller over time. Which of the following is most likely associated with the cause of this patient's symptoms?

question: A 25-year-old male is hospitalized for acute agitation, photophobia, and dysphagia. His parents report that he has been experiencing flu-like symptoms for one week prior to hospital admission. Five weeks ago, the patient was in Mexico, where he went on several spelunking expeditions with friends. The patient ultimately becomes comatose and dies. Autopsy of brain tissue suggests a viral infection. The likely causal virus spreads to the central nervous system (CNS) in the following manner:
question_persian: مردی ۲۵ ساله به دلیل بی‌قراری حاد، ترس از نور و دشواری در بلع در بیمارستان بستری شده است. والدین او گزارش می‌دهند که او یک هفته قبل از بستری شدن در بیمارستان، علائم شبیه به آنفولانزا را تجربه کرده است. پنج هفته پیش، بیمار در مکزیک بود و در آنجا با دوستانش به چندین اکتشاف غاری پرداخت. بیمار در نهایت به حالت اغما رفت و درگذشت. کالبد شکافی بافت مغز نشان‌دهنده عفونت ویروسی است. ویروس محتمل علت‌زا به روش زیر به سیستم عصبی مرکزی (CNS) گسترش می‌یابد:
answer: Retrograde migration up peripheral nerve axons
answer_persian: مهاجرت رتروگراد در طول آکسون‌های اعصاب محیطی

options.C: Retrograde migration up peripheral nerve axons
options.D: Reactivation of virus previously latent in dorsal root ganglia

options_persian.A: پخش خونی به لایه های مننژ
options_persian.C: مهاجرت رتروگرید به سمت بالا در آکسون‌های اعصاب محیطی
options_persian.D: فعال‌سازی مجدد ویروسی که قبلاً در گانگلیون‌های ریشه پشتی نهفته بوده است

new_question_stem: A 25-year-old male is hospitalized for acute agitation, photophobia, and dysphagia. His parents report that he has been experiencing flu-like symptoms for one week prior to hospital admission. Five weeks ago, the patient was in Mexico, where he went on several spelunking expeditions with friends. The patient ultimately becomes comatose and dies. Autopsy of brain tissue suggests a viral infection. The likely causal virus spreads to the central nervous system (CNS) in the following manner:

question: A 68-year-old man comes to the physician with a 1-week history of painless hematuria. A CT scan of the urinary tract shows areas of bladder wall thickening. Cystoscopy shows several sessile masses with central necrosis arising from the bladder wall. A biopsy specimen of the bladder masses shows moderately differentiated urothelial cells with abundant mitotic figures and nuclear atypia. The patient most likely has a history of exposure to which of the following?
question_persian: مردی ۶۸ ساله با سابقه یک هفته‌ای هماچوری بدون درد به پزشک مراجعه می‌کند. سی‌تی اسکن دستگاه ادراری نواحی ضخیم‌شدگی دیواره مثانه را نشان می‌دهد. سیستوسکوپی چندین توده ثابت با نکروز مرکزی که از دیواره مثانه برمی‌خیزند را نشان می‌دهد. نمونه بیوپسی توده‌های مثانه سلول‌های اوروتلیال با تمایز متوسط، شکل‌های میتوزی فراوان و آتیپی هسته‌ای را نشان می‌دهد. بیمار به احتمال زیاد سابقه مواجهه با کدام یک از موارد زیر را دارد؟
new_question_stem: A 68-year-old man comes to the physician with a 1-week history of painless hematuria. A CT scan of the urinary tract shows areas of bladder wall thickening. Cystoscopy shows several sessile masses with central necrosis arising from the bladder wall. A biopsy specimen of the bladder masses shows moderately differentiated urothelial cells with abundant mitotic figures and nuclear atypia. The patient most likely has a history of exposure to which of the following?

question: A 2-year-old boy is brought to the physician because of decreased appetite and abdominal pain for the last several weeks. Physical examination shows a well-appearing toddler with a palpable left-sided abdominal mass that does not cross the midline. A CT of the abdomen shows a large, necrotic tumor on the left kidney. Histological examination of the kidney mass shows primitive blastemal cells and immature tubules and glomeruli. This tissue is most likely derived from the same embryological structure as which of the following?
question_persian: یک پسر ۲ ساله به دلیل کاهش اشتها و درد شکم برای چندین هفته به پزشک آورده شده است. معاینه فیزیکی یک کودک سالم را نشان می‌دهد که دارای یک توده قابل لمس در سمت چپ شکم است که از خط وسط عبور نمی‌کند. سی‌تی اسکن شکم یک تومور بزرگ و نکروتیک در کلیه چپ را نشان می‌دهد. معاینه بافت‌شناسی توده کلیه، سلول‌های بلاستمال اولیه و لوله‌ها و گلومرول‌های نابالغ را نشان می‌دهد. این بافت احتمالاً از همان ساختار جنینی که کدام یک از موارد زیر است، مشتق شده است؟
new_question_stem: A 2-year-old boy is brought to the physician because of decreased appetite and abdominal pain for the last several weeks. Physical examination shows a well-appearing toddler with a palpable left-sided abdominal mass that does not cross the midline. A CT of the abdomen shows a large, necrotic tumor on the left kidney. Histological examination of the kidney mass shows primitive blastemal cells and immature tubules and glomeruli. This tissue is most likely derived from the same embryological structure as which of the following?

question: A 25-year-old man presents to his primary care provider complaining of several weeks of intense itching, particularly localized around his anus. Of note, the patient denies any recent travel, sexual contacts, fever, dysuria, or diarrhea. His temperature is 98.1°F (36.7°C), blood pressure is 110/70 mmHg, pulse is 65/min, and respirations are 12/min. On exam, the patient demonstrates severe excoriations in his perianal region with slight erythema over the areas that are torn. He does not have any other dermatologic findings. The scotch tape test is positive. The patient has a previous documented allergy to albendazole. Which of the following is an alternative medication that can be used?
question_persian: مردی ۲۵ ساله به پزشک مراقبت اولیه خود مراجعه می‌کند و از خارش شدید چند هفته‌ای، به‌ویژه در اطراف مقعد، شکایت دارد. قابل ذکر است که بیمار هرگونه سفر اخیر، تماس جنسی، تب، دیسوریا یا اسهال را انکار می‌کند. دمای بدن او ۹۸.۱ درجه فارنهایت (۳۶.۷ درجه سانتی‌گراد)، فشار خون ۱۱۰/۷۰ میلی‌متر جیوه، نبض ۶۵ ضربه در دقیقه و تعداد تنفس ۱۲ در دقیقه است. در معاینه، بیمار خراش‌های شدید در ناحیه پری‌آنال با کمی اریتما در نواحی پاره شده نشان می‌دهد. او هیچ یافته پوستی دیگری ندارد. تست چسب نواری مثبت است. بیمار حساسیت مستند قبلی به آلبندازول دارد. کدام یک از داروهای زیر می‌تواند به عنوان داروی جایگزین استفاده شود؟
new_question_stem: A 25-year-old man presents to his primary care provider complaining of several weeks of intense itching, particularly localized around his anus. Of note, the patient denies any recent travel, sexual contacts, fever, dysuria, or diarrhea. His temperature is 98.1°F (36.7°C), blood pressure is 110/70 mmHg, pulse is 65/min, and respirations are 12/min. On exam, the patient demonstrates severe excoriations in his perianal region with slight erythema over the areas that are torn. He does not have any other dermatologic findings. The scotch tape test is positive. The patient has a previous documented allergy to albendazole. Which of the following is an alternative medication that can be used?

question: A 53-year-old man comes to the physician for a follow-up appointment three days after being prescribed a selective alpha-1 agonist. He reports improvement in his symptoms and has not experienced any adverse effects. This drug was most likely prescribed for which of the following conditions?
question_persian: مردی ۵۳ ساله برای پیگیری به پزشک مراجعه می‌کند، سه روز پس از تجویز یک آگونیست انتخابی آلفا-۱. او گزارش می‌دهد که علائمش بهبود یافته و هیچ عوارض جانبی را تجربه نکرده است. این دارو به احتمال زیاد برای کدام یک از شرایط زیر تجویز شده است؟
answer: Nasal congestion due to a viral infection
answer_persian: احتقان بینی به دلیل عفونت ویروسی

options.B: Bilateral hand tremors of indeterminate etiology
options.C: Urinary hesitancy due to benign prostatic hyperplasia
options.D: Nasal congestion due to a viral infection
options.E: Blood pressure management prior to pheochromocytoma excision

options_persian.B: لرزش دوطرفه دست با علت نامشخص
options_persian.C: تردید ادراری به دلیل هیپرپلازی خوش‌خیم پروستات
options_persian.D: احتقان بینی به دلیل عفونت ویروسی
options_persian.E: مدیریت فشار خون پیش از برداشت فئوکروموسیتوم

new_question_stem: A 53-year-old man comes to the physician for a follow-up appointment three days after being prescribed a selective alpha-1 agonist. He reports improvement in his symptoms and has not experienced any adverse effects. This drug was most likely prescribed for which of the following conditions?

question: A 49-year-old woman comes to the physician for a scheduled colposcopy. Two weeks ago, she had a routine Pap smear that showed atypical squamous cells. Colposcopy shows an area of white discoloration of the cervix with application of acetic acid solution. Biopsy of this area shows carcinoma-in-situ. Activation of which of the following best explains the pathogenesis of this condition?
question_persian: زنی ۴۹ ساله برای کولپوسکوپی برنامه‌ریزی شده به پزشک مراجعه می‌کند. دو هفته پیش، تست پاپ اسمیر روتین او نشان داد که سلول‌های سنگفرشی غیرطبیعی وجود دارند. کولپوسکوپی ناحیه‌ای از تغییر رنگ سفید در دهانه رحم را با استفاده از محلول اسید استیک نشان می‌دهد. بیوپسی از این ناحیه کارسینومای درجا را نشان می‌دهد. فعال شدن کدام یک از موارد زیر بهترین توضیح برای پاتوژنز این وضعیت است؟
new_question_stem: A 49-year-old woman comes to the physician for a scheduled colposcopy. Two weeks ago, she had a routine Pap smear that showed atypical squamous cells. Colposcopy shows an area of white discoloration of the cervix with application of acetic acid solution. Biopsy of this area shows carcinoma-in-situ. Activation of which of the following best explains the pathogenesis of this condition?

question: In 2005, a group of researchers believed that prophylactically removing the ovaries and fallopian tubes (bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy) in BRCA-mutation positive women would reduce the chance that they developed breast cancer. To test this hypothesis, they reviewed a database of women who were known to be BRCA-mutation positive and divided the group into those with breast cancer and those without breast cancer. They used data in the registry and surveys about peoples’ surgical history to compare the proportion of each population that had undergone a bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy. Based on this data, they reported that women undergoing the procedure had a lower chance of developing breast cancer later in life with an odds ratio of 0.46. This is an example of what type of study design?
question_persian: در سال ۲۰۰۵، گروهی از پژوهشگران بر این باور بودند که برداشتن پیشگیرانه تخمدان‌ها و لوله‌های فالوپ (سالپنگو اوفورکتومی دوطرفه) در زنانی که دارای جهش BRCA هستند، احتمال ابتلا به سرطان پستان را کاهش می‌دهد. برای آزمودن این فرضیه، آنها به بررسی یک پایگاه داده از زنانی که به جهش BRCA مبتلا بودند پرداختند و این گروه را به دو دسته تقسیم کردند: زنانی که به سرطان پستان مبتلا بودند و زنانی که به این بیماری مبتلا نبودند. آنها از داده‌های موجود در این پایگاه و نظرسنجی‌هایی در مورد تاریخچه جراحی افراد استفاده کردند تا نسبت هر یک از این جمعیت‌ها که تحت عمل سالپنگو اوفورکتومی دوطرفه قرار گرفته بودند را مقایسه کنند. بر اساس این داده‌ها، آنها گزارش دادند که زنانی که این عمل را انجام داده بودند، با نسبت شانس ۰.۴۶، احتمال کمتری برای ابتلا به سرطان پستان در آینده داشتند. این یک نمونه از چه نوع طراحی مطالعه‌ای است؟
new_question_stem: In 2005, a group of researchers believed that prophylactically removing the ovaries and fallopian tubes (bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy) in BRCA-mutation positive women would reduce the chance that they developed breast cancer. To test this hypothesis, they reviewed a database of women who were known to be BRCA-mutation positive and divided the group into those with breast cancer and those without breast cancer. They used data in the registry and surveys about peoples’ surgical history to compare the proportion of each population that had undergone a bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy. Based on this data, they reported that women undergoing the procedure had a lower chance of developing breast cancer later in life with an odds ratio of 0.46. This is an example of what type of study design?

question: A clinical researcher is interested in creating a new drug for HIV patients. Darunavir has been particularly efficacious in recent patients; however, some have experienced an increased incidence of hyperglycemia. A new drug called DN501 is developed with the same mechanism of action as darunavir but fewer side effects. Which of the following is the mechanism of action of DN501?
question_persian: یک پژوهشگر بالینی به ایجاد یک داروی جدید برای بیماران مبتلا به HIV علاقه‌مند است. داروناویر در بیماران اخیر به‌طور خاصی مؤثر بوده است؛ با این حال، برخی از بیماران افزایش شیوع هایپرگلیسمی را تجربه کرده‌اند. یک داروی جدید به نام DN501 با همان مکانیزم عمل داروناویر اما با عوارض جانبی کمتر توسعه یافته است. کدام‌یک از موارد زیر مکانیزم عمل DN501 است؟
answer_persian: فرآیند تجمع ویروس را مهار می‌کند

options.C: Inhibits integration of viral genome into the host cell

options_persian.C: جلوگیری از ادغام ژنوم ویروسی با سلول میزبان
options_persian.E: از اتصال سلول‌های T جلوگیری می‌کند

new_question_stem: A clinical researcher is interested in creating a new drug for HIV patients. Darunavir has been particularly efficacious in recent patients; however, some have experienced an increased incidence of hyperglycemia. A new drug called DN501 is developed with the same mechanism of action as darunavir but fewer side effects. Which of the following is the mechanism of action of DN501?

question:
A 4-month-old boy is brought to the pediatrician by his parents. He presents to the pediatric ward with fever, dyspnea, and cough, which he developed 3 days ago. His mother also reports he had poor weight gain despite a good appetite during the past 2 months as well as frequent stools with an unpleasant smell. He was born at 29 weeks via spontaneous vaginal delivery. He is meeting all of his milestones and is up to date with all vaccines. The child is breastfed exclusively. His blood pressure is 80/50 mm Hg, the heart rate is 109/min, the respiratory rate is 29/min, and the temperature is 39.1°C (102.4°F). The patient’s weight is between the 5th and 10th percentile. His length is between the 50th and 75th percentile. The patient is sluggish and reacts torpidly to examination. His skin is pale and dry with decreased turgor and elasticity. On auscultation, there are diminished vesicular sounds and disseminated moist rales at the bases of both lungs. Heart sounds are normal. The abdomen is distended without palpable masses. The patient’s blood analysis shows the following findings:
Complete blood count 
 Erythrocytes  3.3 x 106/mm3
 Hb  12 g/dL
 Total leukocyte count  17,500/mm3
 Neutrophils
 59%
 Lymphocytes
 32%
 Eosinophils
 3%
 Monocytes
 6%
 Basophils
 0
Platelet count
232,000/mm3
Sputum culture grows Pseudomonas aeruginosa. A sweat test shows chloride concentration of 85 mEq/L (elevated). Which of the following is involved in the pathogenesis of this patient’s symptoms?
question_persian:
یک پسر ۴ ماهه توسط والدینش به پزشک کودکان آورده می‌شود. او با تب، تنگی نفس و سرفه که از ۳ روز پیش شروع شده‌اند، به بخش کودکان مراجعه می‌کند. مادرش نیز گزارش می‌دهد که در دو ماه گذشته با وجود اشتهای خوب، افزایش وزن کمی داشته و همچنین مدفوع‌های مکرر با بوی ناخوشایند داشته است. او در ۲۹ هفتگی با زایمان طبیعی خودبخودی به دنیا آمد. او تمام نقطه عطف‌های رشدی خود را کسب کرده و تمام واکسن‌هایش را دریافت کرده است. کودک منحصراً با شیر مادر تغذیه می‌شود. فشار خون او ۸۰/۵۰ میلی‌متر جیوه، ضربان قلب ۱۰۹ در دقیقه، نرخ تنفس ۲۹ در دقیقه و دمای بدن ۳۹.۱ درجه سانتیگراد (۱۰۲.۴ درجه فارنهایت) است. وزن بیمار بین صدک ۵ و ۱۰ است. طول او بین صدک ۵۰ و ۷۵ است. بیمار کسل و به طور آهسته به معاینه واکنش نشان می‌دهد. پوست او رنگ‌پریده و خشک با کاهش تورگور و الاستیسیته است. در سمع، صداهای وزیکولار کاهش یافته و رال‌های مرطوب پراکنده در پایه‌های هر دو ریه شنیده می‌شود. صدای قلب طبیعی است. شکم او متسع است و توده‌های قابل لمس ندارد. آنالیز خون بیمار یافته‌های زیر را نشان می‌دهد:
شمارش کامل خون
گلبول‌های قرمز ۳.۳ x 10^6/mm3
هموگلوبین ۱۲ g/dL
شمارش کل گلبول‌های سفید ۱۷,۵۰۰/mm3
نوتروفیل‌ها ۵۹%
لنفوسیت‌ها ۳۲%
ائوزینوفیل‌ها ۳%
مونوسیت‌ها ۶%
بازوفیل‌ها ۰%
شمارش پلاکت‌ها ۲۳۲,۰۰۰/mm3
کشت خلط رشد سودوموناس آئروژینوزا را نشان می‌دهد. تست عرق غلظت کلرید ۸۵ mEq/L (افزایش یافته) را نشان می‌دهد. کدام یک از موارد زیر در پاتوژنز علائم این بیمار نقش دارد؟

options.A: Neutrophil elastase damages lung tissue due to lack of alpha-1-antitrypsin.
options.D: Electron transport chain in mitochondria is disrupted due to lack of glycerol-3-phosphate dehydrogenase.
options.E: Due to mutations in dynein, the ciliary epithelium fails to provide appropriate mucociliary clearance.

options_persian.A: الاستاز نوتروفیل به دلیل کمبود آلفا-۱-آنتی‌تریپسین به بافت ریه آسیب می‌رساند.
options_persian.C: ائوزینوفیل‌ها به دیواره‌های رگ‌های خونی نفوذ می‌کنند.
options_persian.D: زنجیره انتقال الکترون در میتوکندری به دلیل کمبود گلیسرول-۳-فسفات دهیدروژناز مختل شده است.
options_persian.E: به دلیل جهش‌ها در داینین، اپی‌تلیوم مژک‌دار قادر به تأمین پاک‌سازی مخاطی مناسب نیست.

A 4-month-old boy is brought to the pediatrician by his parents. He presents to the pediatric ward with fever, dyspnea, and cough, which he developed 3 days ago. His mother also reports he had poor weight gain despite a good appetite during the past 2 months as well as frequent stools with an unpleasant smell. He was born at 29 weeks via spontaneous vaginal delivery. He is meeting all of his milestones and is up to date with all vaccines. The child is breastfed exclusively. His blood pressure is 80/50 mm Hg, the heart rate is 109/min, the respiratory rate is 29/min, and the temperature is 39.1°C (102.4°F). The patient’s weight is between the 5th and 10th percentile. His length is between the 50th and 75th percentile. The patient is sluggish and reacts torpidly to examination. His skin is pale and dry with decreased turgor and elasticity. question: A 61-year-old man comes to the emergency department because of a 2-day history of a productive cough and worsening shortness of breath. He has had frequent episodes of a productive cough over the past 3 years. He had smoked 2 packs of cigarettes daily for 30 years but quit 1 year ago. He appears distressed. Pulse oximetry on room air shows an oxygen saturation of 91%. Chest auscultation reveals diffuse wheezes and coarse crackles. A chest x-ray shows increased lung lucency bilaterally and flattening of the diaphragm. Which of the following is the most appropriate initial pharmacotherapy?
question_persian: مردی 61 ساله به بخش اورژانس مراجعه می‌کند به دلیل سابقه 2 روزه سرفه همراه با خلط و تشدید تنگی نفس. او در طی 3 سال گذشته دچار اپیزودهای مکرر سرفه همراه با خلط بوده است. او به مدت 30 سال روزانه 2 بسته سیگار می‌کشید ولی 1 سال پیش ترک کرد. او مضطرب به نظر می‌رسد. پالس اکسیمتری در هوای اتاق اشباع اکسیژن 91 درصد را نشان می‌دهد. سمع قفسه سینه، ویزهای پراکنده و کراکل‌های درشت را نشان می‌دهد. رادیوگرافی قفسه سینه افزایش شفافیت ریه‌ها به طور دوطرفه و صاف شدن دیافراگم را نشان می‌دهد. کدام یک از موارد زیر مناسب‌ترین درمان دارویی اولیه است؟
new_question_stem: A 61-year-old man comes to the emergency department because of a 2-day history of a productive cough and worsening shortness of breath. He has had frequent episodes of a productive cough over the past 3 years. He had smoked 2 packs of cigarettes daily for 30 years but quit 1 year ago. He appears distressed. Pulse oximetry on room air shows an oxygen saturation of 91%. Chest auscultation reveals diffuse wheezes and coarse crackles. A chest x-ray shows increased lung lucency bilaterally and flattening of the diaphragm. Which of the following is the most appropriate initial pharmacotherapy?

question: A 29-year-old woman presents to her primary care doctor with a lesion on her left labia. She first noticed the lesion 3 days ago. The patient describes the lesion as painful and swollen. She denies vaginal discharge. Her past medical history is notable for mild intermittent asthma, gout, and obesity. She uses an albuterol inhaler as needed and takes allopurinol. She has had 5 sexual partners in the past year and uses the pull-out method for contraception. She has a 10-pack-year smoking history and drinks 10-12 alcoholic beverages per week. On exam, she has an ulcerated, tender, and purulent ulcer on the left labia majora. The patient has mild unilateral painful inguinal lymphadenopathy. This patient's condition is most likely caused by which of the following pathogens?
question_persian: زنی ۲۹ ساله به پزشک اولیه خود با ضایعه‌ای در لیبیای چپ مراجعه می‌کند. او سه روز پیش اولین بار به این ضایعه پی برد. بیمار ضایعه را دردناک و متورم توصیف می‌کند. او ترشح واژینال را انکار می‌کند. سابقه پزشکی گذشته او شامل آسم خفیف متناوب، نقرس، و چاقی است. او از اسپری تنفسی آلبوترول به صورت نیاز و آلپورینول استفاده می‌کند. او در سال گذشته ۵ شریک جنسی داشته و از روش خروج قبل از انزال برای جلوگیری از بارداری استفاده می‌کند. او سابقه ۱۰ ساله مصرف سیگار و مصرف ۱۰-۱۲ نوشیدنی الکلی در هفته دارد. در معاینه، او دارای زخمی حساس و چرکی در لیبیای چپ است. بیمار دارای لنفادنوپاتی دردناک یکطرفه خفیف در ناحیه اینگوینال است. وضعیت این بیمار به احتمال زیاد ناشی از کدام یک از پاتوژن‌های زیر است؟
new_question_stem: A 29-year-old woman presents to her primary care doctor with a lesion on her left labia. She first noticed the lesion 3 days ago. The patient describes the lesion as painful and swollen. She denies vaginal discharge. Her past medical history is notable for mild intermittent asthma, gout, and obesity. She uses an albuterol inhaler as needed and takes allopurinol. She has had 5 sexual partners in the past year and uses the pull-out method for contraception. She has a 10-pack-year smoking history and drinks 10-12 alcoholic beverages per week. On exam, she has an ulcerated, tender, and purulent ulcer on the left labia majora. The patient has mild unilateral painful inguinal lymphadenopathy. This patient's condition is most likely caused by which of the following pathogens?

question: A 35-year-old woman presents to the emergency department after losing consciousness at work. On presentation, she is found to be somnolent though she is able to be woken by vocal stimuli. She says that over the last 12 hours, she has been experiencing muscle spasms, blurred vision, dry mouth, and hallucinations. She says that the symptoms started after she went on a hike in the woods and foraged from plants along the way. Physical exam reveals dry red skin and enlarged pupils. Her bladder is also found to be completely full though she says she is unable to urinate. Which of the following drugs would most likely be administered to this patient to treat her symptoms?
question_persian: زنی ۳۵ ساله به دنبال بیهوشی در محل کار به بخش اورژانس مراجعه می کند. در زمان معاینه، او خواب‌آلود است اما با تحریک صوتی بیدار می‌شود. او می‌گوید که در ۱۲ ساعت گذشته، دچار اسپاسم عضلانی، تاری دید، خشکی دهان، و توهم شده است. او می‌گوید که علائم از زمانی شروع شده که به یک پیاده‌روی در جنگل رفته و در طول مسیر از گیاهان تغذیه کرده است. معاینه فیزیکی نشان می‌دهد که پوست او خشک و قرمز است و مردمک‌های او بزرگ شده‌اند. همچنین مثانه او کاملاً پر است اگرچه او می‌گوید که قادر به ادرار کردن نیست. کدام یک از داروهای زیر به احتمال زیاد برای درمان علائم او به این بیمار تجویز خواهد شد؟
new_question_stem: A 35-year-old woman presents to the emergency department after losing consciousness at work. On presentation, she is found to be somnolent though she is able to be woken by vocal stimuli. She says that over the last 12 hours, she has been experiencing muscle spasms, blurred vision, dry mouth, and hallucinations. She says that the symptoms started after she went on a hike in the woods and foraged from plants along the way. Physical exam reveals dry red skin and enlarged pupils. Her bladder is also found to be completely full though she says she is unable to urinate. Which of the following drugs would most likely be administered to this patient to treat her symptoms?
